subject: Attn: Sir/Madam
body:
Attn: Sir/Madam
Do you need a LOAN? Kind reply for more details.
Do you or your business need a loan? Contact us, and get approved and funded within 24 hours, at 3% interest rate only.
Kindly respond immediately via to Ms. Margaret Sharon Becker, private email address for more info's:( 
mb111ks@aol.com
 ) 
Yours,
Dr. Vladimir.

subject: Re:   Attn: Sir/Madam
body:
Dear Dr. Vladimir,

Thank you for your offer. However, I am currently not in need of a loan. I appreciate your consideration and will keep your contact information for future reference.

Best wishes,
Edith
